price: Isheen tun oduu fagoo kan gara keetti beeksisa goonu irraayi. Sis ta’ee ummanni keetis kana dura kan ishee beektan hin turre. Obsi Dhugumatti, booddeen (gaariin) kan warra (Rabbiin) sodataniiti.
arabic: تِلۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهَآ إِلَيۡكَۖ مَا كُنتَ تَعۡلَمُهَآ أَنتَ وَلَا قَوۡمُكَ مِن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَاۖ فَٱصۡبِرۡۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡعَٰقِبَةَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: til'ka min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhā ilayka mā kunta taʿlamuhā anta walā qawmuka min qabli hādhā fa-iṣ'bir inna al-ʿāqibata lil'muttaqīna
